name: Inside a soccer ball
description:
It's best if you don't play on full screen

Entry for weekly game jam 77, but I was too late. Unity crashed twice while exporting the game. The jam's theme was "inside out". I entered a day before it ended. There are still bugs and other tiny problems in it. I don't think I will make an updated version. It also starts pretty abrubtly so beware. Enjoy!
